description:
Denovers LLC, a San Francisco-based Tech company is looking for a highly skilled Frontend Engineer (React.js) for its Karachi office (In-house). As Frontend Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and designing front-end web architecture, Integrating APIs, ensuring the responsiveness of applications. You will directly be collaborating with international clients so good communication skills are required.
Requirements:

At least 1 or 2 years of Experience in (React.js).
Good Problem-solving skills, Self, and Fast Learner.
Attitude to learn and earn.
Good communication skills.
Opportunity to work with a skilled design team.

Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Application Question(s):

How soon can you join?

Experience:

React.js: 1 year (Preferred)

Crystallite Pakistan - (PVT) Limitedis seeking a skilled and experienced Front end Developer to join our team.As a frontend developer, you will be responsible for translating design concepts into responsive and interactive web pages. You will collaborate with the design and development team to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating their expertise in Html, CSS, Javascript, Wordpress and other frontend Frameworks..
Responsibilities:
-Translate design wireframes into well-structured and high-quality code.-Develop and maintain responsive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and Wordpress.-Collaborate with the design team to ensure consistent implementation of UI/UX design principles.-Optimize website performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility.-Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure seamless user experience.
Requirements:
-Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent experience)-Minimum of 2 years of professional experience as a frontend developer-Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript-Experience with at least one modern frontend framework (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).-Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).-Knowledge of UI/UX design principles and the ability to collaborate effectively with designers.
Job Type: Full-time
Experience:

Frontend (Preferred)

Shift availability:

Night Shift (Preferred)

A Frontend Developer is responsible for creating and implementing the visual and interactive elements of a website or application. They work closely with designers, back-end developers, and stakeholders to ensure that the user experience is seamless and intuitive. Frontend Developers use a combination of programming languages and tools to bring design concepts to life, and must be able to balance technical skills with creativity and attention to detail.
Key Responsibilities:- Collaborate with designers, back-end developers, and stakeholders to develop and implement user-friendly interfaces and interactive features- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript- Hands-on experience with JS libraries and frameworks like ReactJS, VueJS, Angular- Should be able to connect APIs with frontend shared by backend team- Optimize web pages for maximum speed and scalability- Ensure cross-browser and cross-device compatibility- Identify and troubleshoot issues related to performance, user experience, and accessibility- Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development- Conduct usability testing and gather feedback from users to improve website or application design- Communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders
Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field- Proven experience as a Frontend Developer or similar role- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js- Experience with responsive design, mobile-first development, and cross-browser compatibility- Knowledge of user experience (UX) design principles and methodologies- Familiarity with version control tools such as Git- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
Preferred Qualifications:- Experience with web performance optimization techniques- Familiarity with server-side scripting languages such as PHP or Node.js- Knowledge of search engine optimization (SEO) best practices- Experience with web accessibility standards and guidelines (WCAG)- Strong portfolio showcasing previous web development projects
Job Type: Full-time

Centegy Technologies is on the lookout for creative Frontend Developers to build well-structured, and rich client-side applications.
Responsibilities

Able to develop visually appealing designs for web applications
Translate business requirements into functional frontend code
Integrate UI components with APIs and databases
Build high-quality, scalable, and reusable code

Job Requirements:

Possess a strong knowledge of HTML,CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular, Jquery, Figma, Adobe XD

Career Level: Fresh to 1 year of relevant experience
Qualification: BS (CS) or equivalent
Location: Karachi
If you possess the desired skills, apply now.
Job Type: Full-time
Education:

Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

frontend development: 1 year (Required)

Pinnacle is seeking a highly skilled “Frontend Engineer” with 2 years of professional experience with a strong focus on frontend development. The ideal candidate is a creative individual who thinks out of the box and would like to work in a diverse technology environment.
Technical Skills (Required):

Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Proficiency in responsive web design and cross-browser compatibility.
Knowledge of front-end build tools like Webpack, Gulp, or Grunt.
Familiarity with version control systems like Git and code collaboration platforms (GitHub, Bitbucket).
Understanding of UI/UX principles and ability to work closely with designers.
Experience with RESTful APIs integration and asynchronous programming.
Experience of integrating JSON Based Microservices.
Knowledge of performance optimization techniques for web applications.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within a team.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Experience as a Frontend Engineer for minimum 1-2 Years.
Stay up to date with industry trends, advancements, and emerging technologies related to frontend development.

Interpersonal Skills:

Ability to understand business requirements.
Strong software architecture and design concepts.
Excellent analytical, diagnostic, and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to multitask, prioritize work, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.

Shift: Canadian Time zones
Gender: Male/Female
Location: DHA Phase II Ext, Karachi.
Send CV to careers@hirelivesupport.com
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: Rs90,000.00 - Rs100,000.00 per month
Education:

Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

Frontend Engineer: 2 years (Required)

Language:

Ènglish (Required)

Shift availability:

Night Shift (Required)
Overnight Shift (Required)
